text: __NOTOC__ Khariton is a variant of the Greek name Chariton. It may refer to: ==Surname== * Yulii Khariton (1904–1996), Russian physicist ==Given name== *Khariton Laptev *Khariton Platonov *Khariton Chebotaryov ==Other== * 9263 Khariton, an asteroid ==See also== * Chariton (disambiguation) * Hariton * Kharitonov, a surname, a patronymic derivation of the name
title: Khariton
